author: Chris Tomlinson, Chris Tomlinson
title: Expert Predicts Coronavirus 'Tragedy' in Sweden as Deaths Increase
description: A Swedish infectious medicine professor has predicted the country may be headed towards "tragedy" as Wuhan coronavirus fatalities surge, with elderly homes accounting for a quarter of all deaths.
content:
A Swedish infectious medicine professor has predicted the country may be headed towards “tragedy” as Chinese coronavirus fatalities surge, with old people’s homes accounting for a quarter of all deaths.
